snippet.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quest for Balance – Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Get your first look at Avatar: The Last Airbender: Quest for Balance, the upcoming action-adventure from Bamtang Games and Game Mill Entertainment that will let you play solo or in two-player local or online co-op as your choice of nine different Avatar: The Last Airbender characters. Quest for Balance will be released later this year for all major platforms (PC, Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S).

#IGN #Avatar
